about_the_game:
Dreamians: Card Battle is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with creatures that can evolve mid-battle and unexpectedly change the course of the fight. The game features three main Dreamians: the half-red dragon, half-dog Dragnis; the blue wolf Wolfae; and the nightmare bat Kalek. Each one has its own powers and solutions to face the challenges presented in the game.

In Dreamians: Card Battle, the player ventures into the world of Dreamians, which can only be accessed when we sleep or when placed in a special machine to connect to this world, inducing sleep and forcing a powerful astral projection.

The world of Dreamians is being invaded by the fearsome Dream Travelers who seek to take all possible dreams for themselves. It is up to the player and their Dreamian to win fierce battles on 5 maps that pass through forests, mountains, broken cities, paths of fire, and even a distorted dimension.



Numbers:
+100 - Cards to play. They are attack, defense, and special cards.
+40 - Dream Jewels that modify Dreamian's attributes.
+30 - Enemies of different forms.
5 - Dream Travelers.
5 - Different scenarios.

Meet the Dreamians:



Dragnis: A being half-dragon with a dog-like appearance. He is a very docile, loyal Dreamian, but knows how to attack when necessary. He has a taste for childish jokes and is very stubborn. Dragnis can evolve into his more powerful forms, Draghium and Dragnor.



Wolfae: Don't be fooled by his cute appearance. He is an excellent warrior. He waits for the right moment to attack and can evolve into two very powerful forms: Wofaion and Vuk.



Kalek: He was born from a nightmare that was defeated. Now he gets along well with humans who dream of him. His long wings allow him to fly high and his large ears make him hear very well. When his tattoos glow, he knows an attack is coming. He can evolve into two forms: Kalan and Kaliel.



Delirium Time!

Delirium Activation is triggered when the player has filled the special evolution bar. If the player possesses the special Delirium card, they can evolve their cute creature into a more lethal form. Each Dreamian has two forms of Delirium, the HyperDelirium version and MegaDelirium. It's a fun and very useful dynamic for winning tougher battles.

name: Dreamians: Card Battle
short_description: Dreamians: Card Battle is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with creatures that can evolve and change the course of battles unexpectedly. Play with one of the 3 main characters and face epic battles using over a hundred cards to save the dream world.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
